So, you will save $36 on your jacket.

generated:

Final Price = Original Price * (1 - Discount Percentage / 100)

So, you'd add $160 to your total before the discount to get your final price.

Please note that this is just an example. In reality, it depends on the specific rules of the store and can vary depending on the rules of each store.
